testsuite.name: TestCases.amazonAutomationTestCase
testsuite.system-out: Searching : hats for men Clicked on search button Selected the first hat Moved to new tab Clicked on Quantity button Selected Quantity size to 2 Item added to the cart Clicked on Cart button Retreiving the text as amount Men hat total Quantity: 2 Actual Total Amount: 1,198.00 Expected Total Amount: 1,198.00 Actual amount matches expected amount
